item.title: R Data Types
item.description: Vectors All elements in an R vector must have the same mode: integer, numeric, character, logical, complex, etc. x <- c(88, 12, 23, 74) Find the length of a vector with length(x): length(x) ## [1] 4 To iterate through the vector requires an index: second <- function(x) { for (i in 1:length(x)) { if(i == 2) break # break out of loop } return(x[i]) } second(x) ## [1] 12 Matricies One way to create a matrix:
